sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Row, Col, Card, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip } from 'react-bootstrap'; import ModuleNotification from '../../../components/Widgets/Statistic/Notification'; const BasicTooltips = () => { return ( Tooltip Tooltip on top} > Tooltip on left} > Tooltip on right} > Tooltip on bottom} > Tooltip with HTML} > ); } export default BasicTooltips;
